name: CTP
description:
CTP is a Boston-based digital, advertising and PR agency that turns data-driven insights into award-winning work and measurable results for our clients.
We unleash the power of the human spirit for brands that want to live out loud.
Our clients range from meatballs and banks to software and baseball, but they share a common trait of vital importance. We believe nothing becomes meaningful, or memorable, until viewed through the lens of personal experience.
Today's consumers demand authentic engagement. Speaking to their interests. Listening to their desires. Responding to their worries. Understanding their emotions. Our people have that rare and oh-so-human ability to craft those conversations.
